> > > blur
> > > > > cutting past the

> > > > > >

> > > > > quickly, and hits the 
> > > > > > ground diagonally on his feet, sliding for
> a
> > > few
> > > > > metres.
> > > > > >

> > > your
> > > > > life," Megatron 
> > > > > > sneers, as he raises his plasma gun at

> > > > > > alloy axe.
